Title: AN ACT TO MAKE THE PROVINCE OF MINDORO A REGULARLY ORGANIZED PROVINCE.
Data:
[ Act No. 2964, February 20, 1921 ]
AN ACT TO MAKE THE PROVINCE OF MINDORO A REGULARLY ORGANIZED PROVINCE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. All the provisions of laws now applicable or which may hereafter be applicable to the regularly organized provinces are hereby extended and applied to the Province of Mindoro.
Section 2. The provisions of Act Numbered Twenty-eight hundred and twenty-nine regulating the salaries of the provincial officers are likewise made applicable to the Province of Mindoro: Provided, That the salary of the provincial fiscal of Mindoro shall not be less than three thousand pesos per annum, any provision of law to the contrary notwithstanding.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 3. All acts or parts of acts inconsistent with the provisions of this Act are hereby repealed.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect on July first, nineteen hundred and twenty-one.
Approved, February 20, 1921.
